title: North East Line service disruption due to signalling fault

updates.text: 28/07, 8.32pm: NEL full svc has resumed. Free bus rides have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
28/07, 8.12pm: NEL full svc has resumed. Free Passing-by Bus service available between Sengkang & Punggol. We are sorry
28/07, 8.12pm: NEL full svc has resumed. Free Passing-by Bus service available between Sengkang & Punggol. We are sorry.
28/07, 7.53pm: NEL svc is delayed in both directions due to a signalling fault. Additional travel time of up to 15 minutes may be expected
